Welcome to the Personal Knowledge Container!<br>

''Follow our [[Interactive_Tutorial]] to learn how to use this product.''<br>

The [[Personal Knowledge Container]] is your Private Data Vault.<br>
It's a secure place where you own and govern your [[Verified Data]]. <br> 
Empowered by the open source DataAccounting Software.<br>

Get started by logging in with the option: 'Login with Ethereum Wallet' in the upper right corner.

You can read about all of the actions in the [[PKC_Documentation]].

Configure and find more information about it here: </i>[[Special:DataAccountingConfig|Data Accounting Configurator]]<i>
